reviewText:
It should be noted that the chain maille items in the video require soldering. The items all use precious metals. I was looking for a standard chain maille making video or braided wire video to use with any type of wire.  It is a good video if you are looking for a jewelry book requiring precious metal soldering. The description definitely needs to be rewritten as the title to the video is slightly deceiving.

Could be a four star if I were looking for a Precious metal (soldered)chain maille jewelry video.
